title: What is our responsibility as a human being to protect our environment? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can do many small things to protect the environment: Say no to ‘single-use plastic’use reusable bags.Use matches instead of disposable plastic lightersBuy boxes of things like detergent instead of bottles.bring your shopping bags with you.avoid purchasing plastic bags.use less plastic ware at home.Pack your lunch in reusable containers and bagsUse a razor with replaceable blades instead of a disposable razorUse cloth instead of baby diapers.These small things done by an individual can minimize greenhouse gas emissions and other pollutants.
